content:
The farm score is calculated based on the agricultural parameters of the farms that belong to a farmer. It comprises of a base score (based on irrigation condition and cropping intensity of farms) and seasonal scores for kharif & rabi seasons, each calculated based on the farming history in the past 3 years.

Insight: Farm Score reflects Overall Productivity & Revenue potential of the Farm

Score reflecting the year round capabilities -currently a combination of cropping intensity and irrigation mapping.

Insight:  Base Score reflects well equiped irrigation system and better land utilization for crop cultivation at Farm.

It reflects capacity of a farm/farmer based on agricultural performance in the kharif/Rabi season.

Insight:  Score reflects Productivity & revenue potential of the farm in Kharif/Rabi season

Agricultural water content masured by using multipspectral data to classify if a land parcel is irrigated or not.

Insight: Higher crop yield in irrigated farms compare to non-irrigated farms
Insight: Survey Nos equiped with Irrigation system e.g. Pump, Drip etc.
Insight: Survey Nos depend on rain for irrigation

Number of crop cycles in a year, as identified  using satellite image. For one cycle it is Once in a Year, for two it is a twice in a year. 

Insight: Cropping Intensity denotes level of land utilization for crop cultivation.
Insight: Survey Nos having one cultivation cycle of crop production. Partial land utilization for crop production.
Insight: Survey Nos having two cultivation cycle of crop production. Total land utilization for crop production.
Insight: No crop cultivation in the farm. Land not utilized for farming.
Insight:Name of the crops grown in the farm in last one year
Insight: Crops that are wildely grown in a certain unit area/region. Benchmark to verify the cropping pattern of the farm vis a vis the district.
Insight: To asses the seasonal cropping pattern in a year (Kharif & Rabi). Kharif Season is from June to October & Rabi Season is from November to April.
Insight: Major crops cultivated at district level

It is the total area for a particular crop grown in a district over the season.

Insight: Area under major crops at district level
An area measurement unit, 1 ha = 2.47 acre
Average Yield/unit area of the major crops at distict level
